titleStmt.title: A warning for worldlings, or, A comfort to the godly, and a terror to the wicked set forth dialogue wise, betweene a scholler and a trauailer / by Ieremie Corderoy, student in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Corderoy, Jeremy, b. 1562 or 3.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, for Lawrence Lyle, and are to be sold at the Tygars head in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Error in paging: 140, 141 repeated, and 142, 143 lacking, in number only.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the Tygars head in Paules Church-yard
